analyzed: gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Ārya Mañjuśrī.

original: de kho na nyid bzhin du stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes su sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bzhin du stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes su sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
translated: After meditating on emptiness just as it is, on a multicolored lotus,

original: zla ba la aa yig dkar po las skyes pa /
analyzed: zla ba la aa yig dkar po las skyes pa /
translated: from a white A syllable arises

original: dpal chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug yan lag thams cad dkar po zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa /
analyzed: dpal chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug yan lag thams cad dkar po zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa /
translated: Śrī Dharmadhatvādhipa, with all limbs white, four faces, and eight arms,

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan can lha rdzas kyi gos dang rgyan dang sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan can lha rdzas kyi gos dang rgyan dang sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
translated: with a crown of the jewels of the five buddhas, wearing divine garments and ornaments, and endowed with the expressions of grace and so forth.

original: phyag gnyis ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: phyag gnyis ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o //
translated: The two hands are marked with the dharmacakra mudra.

original: ral gri dang mda' dang / rdo rje ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
analyzed: ral gri dang mda' dang / rdo rje ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
translated: The sword, arrow, and vajra are in the three right hands.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang gzhu dang dril bu g-yon pa'i phyag gsum na'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang gzhu dang dril bu g-yon pa'i phyag gsum na'o //
translated: The book of the perfection of wisdom, the bow, and the bell are in the three left hands.

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid du bskyed nas /
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid du bskyed nas /
translated: Having generated oneself as having the vajra posture,

original: snying gar zla ba las h'um sngon po las skyes pa'i rdo rje sa bon dang bcas pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: snying gar zla ba las h'um sngon po las skyes pa'i rdo rje sa bon dang bcas pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: at the heart, from a moon, from a blue hūṃ, a vajra arises with the seed. This is the nature of the great seal.

original: smin mtshams su tr'am yig ser po las skyes pa rin po che sa bon dang bcas pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: smin mtshams su tr'am yig ser po las skyes pa rin po che sa bon dang bcas pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Between the eyebrows, from a yellow taṃ syllable, a jewel arises with the seed. This is the nature of the doctrine seal.

original: mgrin par hr'i:yig dmar po las skyes pa padma sa bon dang bcas pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mgrin par hr'i:yig dmar po las skyes pa padma sa bon dang bcas pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
translated: At the throat, from a red hrīḥ syllable, a lotus arises with the seed. This is the nature of the pledge seal.

original: spyi gtsug tu a'a:yig dkar po las skyes pa sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram sa bon dang bcas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: spyi gtsug tu a'a:yig dkar po las skyes pa sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram sa bon dang bcas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
translated: At the crown, from a white āḥ syllable, a crossed vajra arises with the seed. This is the nature of the action seal.

original: 'dis phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the nature of the four seals.

original: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga b'an dzny'a na m'urti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dharm'a ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri shuddha dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
analyzed: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga b'an dzny'a na m'urti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dharm'a ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri shuddha dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
translated: Om hum hrih Bhagavan jnanamurti vagishvara maha-pach sarva dharma gagana amalasupari shuddha dharma dhatu jnana garbha a.

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po //
translated: One should bless with this mantra.

original: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni ral gri'i rnam par gzung bar bya /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni ral gri'i rnam par gzung bar bya /
translated: Then, having formed the vajra-fist, one should break the third joint of the two middle fingers, holding them in the form of a sword.

original: mdzub mo gnyis mtheb chen langs pa'i steng du bskum par bya ste /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis mtheb chen langs pa'i steng du bskum par bya ste /
translated: One should bend the two index fingers on top of the raised thumbs.

original: gzung ba de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gzung ba de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: That is the pledge seal.

original: der rang gi lce la zla ba la gnas pa'i hr'i:yig dmar po'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
analyzed: der rang gi lce la zla ba la gnas pa'i hr'i:yig dmar po'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that one's tongue is blessed by the seed syllable of the red hrih on a moon.

original: khro bo'i ngag gis bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i ngag gis bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: One should recite with an angry voice.

original: de la 'di'i ngag gi bzlas pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'di'i ngag gi bzlas pa ni /
translated: Here, the recitation of the voice is as follows.

original: aom badzra t'ikshna du:khatstshe da pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye dzny'a na k'a ya b'a g'i shva ra aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma:/
analyzed: aom badzra t'ikshna du:khatstshe da pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye dzny'a na k'a ya b'a g'i shva ra aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma:/
translated: Oṃ vajra tiṣṭha duḥkhaccheda prajñājñānamūrtaye | Jñānakāya vāgīśvara arhāpacanāya te namaḥ.

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ji ltar dus gsum du bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ji ltar dus gsum du bklag par bya'o //
translated: [The one hundred and eight names and the Prajñāpāramitā in eight thousand lines should be recited in the same way as the three times.]

original: chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sādhana of the lord of speech of the dharmadhātu is complete.

original: khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong dharma k'irtis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong dharma k'irtis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: Translated by the Khampa lotsāwa Bari Lotsāwa Gelong Dharma Kirti.
